title: heroin fever reduction novel formulation and delivery mechanism
abstract: This invention relates to an improved pharmaceutical formulation of heroin, designed for enhanced fever reduction. The composition includes modified excipients which result in improved bioavailability, reduced first-pass metabolism, and superior therapeutic control. The formulation offers manufacturing advantages and potential clinical benefit compared to existing products.
